parameters.name: IpamId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPAM instance.

parameters.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource discovery instance.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results.

- For the first query, leave this parameter empty.

- For a subsequent query, set this parameter to the NextToken value returned from the previous response.
